data.description: CORSAIRâ€™s Cost Accounting team is seeking a Management Information Services (MIS) intern with strong excel skills to assist the department in streamlining the data analysis needed for certain key processes like Inventory Valuation, Overhead Capitalization and Manufacturing spend analyses. The Cost Accounting intern will have the opportunity to learn the key Inventory and Management Accounting concepts while helping the team develop and refine the excel models used in Month End and Quarter End financial statement close.
